titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the Hollings Manufacturing Extension Partnership Program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S83)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
1/4/2007--Introduced.
Authorizes appropriations to the Secretary of Commerce for the Hollings Manufacturing Extension Partnership Program of the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) for FY2008-FY2012.
